title: Example: Qa Engineer — Buenos Aires (es-AR)
html:
Example — Qa Engineer in Buenos Aires (es-AR)

ATS‑ready example localized for es-AR. Use action verbs and quantify impact.

  • Optimized core module; reduced latency by 28%.
  • Built CI/CD; accelerated releases from weekly to daily.
  • Collaborated with cross‑functional teams to hit milestones.
